item.title: Cover image example
item.description: Covers are displayed before article title in full page width. Use a large image, 1200px width at least.

item.title: KaTeX support
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Google Custom Search
item.description: It’s possible to use Google Search in this theme, all you need to do is set it in paramenters.

item.title: Date format
item.description: It’s possible to change the date format used in this theme, all you need to do is set it in paramenters.

item.title: AddThis: Engage with your audience
item.description: It’s possible to use AddThis in this theme, all you need to do is set it in paramenters.

item.title: Google Ads
item.description: It’s possible to use Google Ads in this theme, all you need to do is set it in paramenters.

item.title: MathJax support
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Social icons on footer
item.description: Connect with your users, display your social network.

item.title: Theme menus
item.description: Menus help users navigate on you site

item.title: Thumbnail image example
item.description: Thumbnails are used in the Home page.

item.title: SEO image example
item.description: You can also define images for SEO, some social networks require square images.

item.title: Alert shortcode
item.description: Learn how to use built in alert shortcode in this theme

item.title: Button shortcode
item.description: Learn how to use built in button shortcode in this theme

item.title: Contact form shortcode
item.description: Learn how to use built in contact form shortcode in this theme

item.title: Figure shortcode
item.description: You can use Shortcodes to display images in any part of your article.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Get in contact with us! Email Name Subject Message Submit

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About
item.description: Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache Licence 2.
